system.effect: 20 Metre Thick ship bow, +4 Armour on fore arc, and +1d10 damage when ramming. Cannot have Prow Macrobatteries or Lances. Only one per vessel.

description.value: 20 Metre Thick ship bow, +4 Armour on fore arc, and +1d10 damage when ramming. Cannot have Prow Macrobatteries or Lances. Only one per vessel.
